@People having problems
You don't have .NET framework installed. Where you installed the game there should be two installers with a similar name to dotNetFx40_Full_x86_x64, click one [I don't know what the difference is], install it, and the game should work fine afterwards.
you need MS FRAMEWORK 4.0,  XNA FRAMEWORK and Direct X to play terarria
1.0.6 is out get that update out NOW!!!! ME WANT MORE TERRARIA!!!
